item.title: Docker Swarm
item.description: Docker Swarm to initialize Swarm $ docker swarm init or $ docker swarm init --advertise-addr $(hostname -i) to join as a worker node from the above init command the manager node is configured and there would be two commands listed, one to join as a worker node and other to join as another manager node. $ docker swarm join --token <xxxxx-x-xxx...> <host> to show the list of nodes in action this will show the active nodes and the Leader node
